About us

Over the past 30 years, we have valued our customers and employees realizing that our success and longevity in the business has been fueled by the loyalty and integrity of the local communities we serve. Moving in to the next 30 years, we are forever and continuing to provide quality service at a high level of customer value while integrating technologies to improve the solid waste and recycling collection process.

How it started

Our story

In 2015, one of our founders had an experience with landing pages where he realized that you canâ€™t control your results, but only act on them. This is what inspired him and the other co-founder to build a landing page design tool which helps users build their landing pages.

Our team

Willie K. Goode
Founder & CEO

After starting out on the back of a truck, the CEO of Goode Companies, Inc. has grown a multi-company portfolio.

Willie D. Goode
Chief Operating Officer

At 27, Willie successfully led GCI's expansion into Baltimore as VP of Roll-off/Commercial Operations, increasing revenues year over year.
